definitions: the bringing of goods or services into a country from abroad for sale

examples.text: manufacturers fought to restrict the importation of cheap foreign goods
the government takes a tough stance on illegal drug importation

shortDefinitions: bringing of goods or services into country from abroad for sale

definitions: the introduction of an idea from a different place or context

examples.text: his avid importation of ideas from European and Asian thinkers

shortDefinitions: introduction of idea from different place or context
